categories.label: Crime
categories.title: Crime Statistics
categories.subtitle: Monthly crime incident reports
categories.aiSummary: Overall crime rates have decreased steadily over the reporting period, with a notable reduction in violent crimes. Community policing initiatives have shown positive results.

categories.label: Economy
categories.title: Economic Indicators
categories.subtitle: Employment and business growth
categories.aiSummary: Economic growth has been positive but variable, with employment rates showing resilience despite market fluctuations. Small business formation has increased 20% in the past five years.

categories.label: Housing
categories.title: Housing Affordability
categories.subtitle: Median home prices and rent
categories.aiSummary: Housing costs have risen significantly over the past two decades, with median home prices increasing by 275%. Recent policies have slowed the rate of increase, but affordability remains a major challenge.

categories.label: Safety
categories.title: Public Safety Metrics
categories.subtitle: Emergency response and prevention
categories.aiSummary: Public safety metrics show improvements in emergency response times and prevention measures. Community engagement programs have contributed to enhanced safety awareness.

categories.label: Health
categories.title: Public Health Metrics
categories.subtitle: Key health indicators
categories.aiSummary: Public health indicators show steady improvement with a 30% increase in access to healthcare services. Vaccination rates and preventive care metrics have shown particularly strong growth.

categories.label: Transportation
categories.title: Transit Performance
categories.subtitle: Public transportation metrics
categories.aiSummary: Public transit ridership has declined 40% from peak levels, though recent infrastructure investments are showing promising early results in service reliability.
